Options.label: B
Options.text: Only if the salary is 20000 or less and the employee id is less than 125, insert EMPLOYEE_ID, MANAGER_ID, and SALARY into the MGR_HISTORY table.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Regardless of salary and employee id, insert EMPLOYEE_ID, MANAGER_ID, and SALARY into the MGR_HISTORY table.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Regardless of salary, only if the employee id is less than 125, insert EMPLOYEE_ID, MANAGER_ID, and SALARY into the MGR_HISTORY table.

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true regarding non-equijoins?

Options.label: A
Options.text: The USING clause can be used.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Table aliases must be used.

Options.label: C
Options.text: The Oracle join syntax can be used.

Options.label: D
Options.text: The SQL:1999 compliant ANSI join syntax must be used.

Options.label: E
Options.text: The ON clause can be used.

questions.Explanation:
A.USING 只能用于等值连接，并且列名相同的情况。非等值连接的条件不是简单等号，所以不能用 USING。
SELECT EMP_ID, DEPT_NAME
FROM EMPLOYEE
JOIN DEPARTMENT
USING (DEPT_ID);

questions.QuestionText: Which two object privileges can be restricted to a subset of columns in a table?

Options.label: A
Options.text: ALTER

Options.label: B
Options.text: UPDATE

Options.label: C
Options.text: DELETE

Options.label: D
Options.text: INSERT

Options.label: E
Options.text: INDEX

questions.Explanation:
A.ALTER 是修改表结构的权限，不能限制到部分列，只能作用于整个表。
C.DELETE 是删除整行的权限，不涉及列，因此不能限制到部分列
E.INDEX 权限是创建索引的权限，作用于表，而不是列

questions.QuestionText: Which two are true about the USING clause when joining tables?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It can never be used with a natural join.

Options.label: B
Options.text: It is used to specify an explicit join condition involving operators.

Options.label: C
Options.text: It can never be used with a full outer join.

Options.label: D
Options.text: All column names in a USING clause must be qualified with a table name or table alias.

Options.label: E
Options.text: It is used to specify an equijoin of columns that have the same name in both tables.

questions.Explanation:
USING 子句用于 等值连接（equijoin），而且只能用于两个表中具有相同列名的列，在 USING 子句中，这个公共列在结果集中只显示一次，而且不能加表别名
B.USING 只能做 等值比较（=），不能写诸如 >, <, BETWEEN 或者函数调用。如果你想用运算符，就必须使用 ON
CSELECT *
FROM employees
FULL OUTER JOIN departments
USING (department_id);
D.在 USING子句里，列名不能加表名或别名

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about Oracle Managed Files (OMF)?

Options.label: A
Options.text: If DB_RECOVERY_FILE_DEST is specified but DB_CREATE_ONLINE_LOG_DEST_n is not, the redo logs and control files are placed in DB_RECOVERY_FILE_DEST by default.

Options.label: B
Options.text: If DB_RECOVERY_FILE_DEST is specified, at least two different locations must be specified for DB_CREATE_ONLINE_LOG_DEST_n.

Options.label: C
Options.text: If only DB_CREATE_FILE_DEST is specified, only data files and temp files are Oracle managed.

Options.label: D
Options.text: If DB_CREATE_ONLINE_LOG_DEST_1 is specified but DB_CREATE_FILE_DEST is not, new data files and temp files are stored in DB_CREATE_ONLINE_LOG_DEST_1 by default.

Options.label: E
Options.text: If DB_CREATE_FILE_DEST is specified but DB_CREATE_ONLINE_LOG_DEST_n is not, new redo logs and control files are stored in DB_CREATE_FILE_DEST by default.

Options.label: F
Options.text: If only DB_CREATE_ONLINE_LOG_DEST_1 is specified, only redo logs and control files are Oracle managed.

questions.Explanation:
OMF（Oracle Managed Files）创建、命名、管理 数据库文件（Datafile、Tempfile、Redo log、Control file）
DB_CREATE_FILE_DEST:控制Datafiles、Tempfiles，用于:表空间、临时表空间,指定数据文件默认目录
DB_CREATE_ONLINE_LOG_DEST_n:控制Redo Logs、Control Files,用于在线日志与控制文件（最多5个路径）可用于日志多路复用
DB_RECOVERY_FILE_DEST控制归档日志、闪回日志、备份片等，用于快速恢复区（FRA）也可能存放日志与控制文件(若未指定 log dest)
File（DB_CREATE_FILE_DEST） → 管 数据文件（data/temp）; Log（DB_CREATE_ONLINE_LOG_DEST_n） → 管 日志与控制文件; Recovery（DB_RECOVERY_FILE_DEST） → 底线兜底目录，如果上面两个没设，就放这

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about segment types in an Oracle Database?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Index segments always have two or more extents.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Undo segments are only stored in an undo tablespace.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Temporary segments are only stored in a temporary tablespace.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Cluster segments may contain data from multiple tables.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Table segments always have two or more extents.

questions.Explanation:
B.系统undo 段是放在 system 表空间,undo 段也会放在临时表空间。
 D.Cluster（簇）允许将多张表按相同的列值放在同一物理存储区，以减少 I/O。因此 Cluster Segment会存储多张表的数据。

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about the Oracle Database server during and immediately after SHUTDOWN TRANSACTIONAL?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Uncommitted transactions are allowed to continue to the next ROLLBACK.

Options.label: B
Options.text: New connection requests made to the database instance are refused.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Instance recovery occurs at the next restart.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Instance recovery occurs automatically during the shutdown.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Sessions remain connected even if they are not running a transaction.

Options.label: F
Options.text: Uncommitted transactions are allowed to continue to the next COMMIT.

questions.Explanation:
SHUTDOWN NORMAL:等待所有用户断开连接后关闭实例；不会强制回滚事务
SHUTDOWN IMMEDIATE立刻断开所有会话，回滚未提交事务，关闭实例
SHUTDOWN TRANSACTIONAL等待当前活动事务完成（COMMIT 或 ROLLBACK）后，再关闭；拒绝新连接
SHUTDOWN ABORT立刻终止所有会话，未提交事务丢失；不等待写入磁盘
D.SHUTDOWN TRANSACTIONAL 主要 允许已启动事务继续，空闲会话（没有活动事务）一般会立即断开或等待事务启动后处理，所以不能说“所有空闲会话保持连接”

questions.QuestionText: Which four statements are true about the Oracle Server architecture?

Options.label: A
Options.text: A person or program can have more than one session with an instance by logging in with different usernames.

Options.label: B
Options.text: A person or program can have more than one session with an instance by logging in with the same username.

Options.label: C
Options.text: A connection represents the state of a user's login to an instance.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Each server process and background process has their own Program Global Area (PGA).

Options.label: E
Options.text: The buffer cache and the redo log buffer are held in the large pool.

Options.label: F
Options.text: The entire data dictionary is always cached in the shared pool to improve performance.

Options.label: G
Options.text: A session represents the state of a user's login to an instance.

questions.Explanation:
Oracle Server架构基础:
--1.进程（Processes）:Server Process（服务器进程）：处理用户请求;Background Processes（后台进程）：如 SMON、PMON、DBWn、LGWR等
--2.内存结构（Memory Structures）:
*****SGA（System Global Area）：实例共享内存，包括：Shared Pool（共享池：Shared Pool就是Oracle的高速缓存区，用来存储常用SQL、PL/SQL、数据字典信息，避免每次都去硬盘读取）Database Buffer Cache（缓冲池）Redo Log Buffer（重做日志缓冲区）
*****PGA（Program Global Area）：每个用户进程或后台进程独有的内存区域
--3.逻辑单位:Session（会话）：用户登录实例后的状态信息; Connection（连接）：表示客户端与 Oracle 实例的物理连接
C.Connection 是客户端与服务器之间的物理连接，不包含用户事务的状态。Session才表示用户登录的状态，包括事务、变量、游标等。
E.large pool是shared pool中的子区域，主要是大型 I/O、并行查询、RMAN 备份等使用（非核心部分）
F.数据字典对象（如表、列定义）按需缓存在 Shared Pool 中，不可能全部缓存。Oracle 会根据 LRU（最近最少使用）策略动态管理缓存。

Options.label: A
Options.text: Compressed objects in SALES01.DBF will be uncompressed in SALES02.DBF after the move.

Options.label: B
Options.text: DML may be performed on tables with one or more extents in this data file during the execution of this command.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Tables with one or more extents in this data file may be queried during the execution of this command.

Options.label: D
Options.text: The 'TO' clause containing the new file name must be specified even if Oracle Managed Files (OMF) is used.

Options.label: E
Options.text: It overwrites any existing file with the name SALES02.DBF in /u02 by default.

questions.Explanation:
A.数据文件移动不会改变表或索引的存储格式
D.如果使用 OMF，Oracle 会自动管理文件名和路径，可以不写 TO，Oracle 会生成默认路径
E.Oracle 不会默认覆盖已有文件，如果目标位置已有同名文件，会报错

Options.label: A
Options.text: in the SPFILE and PFILE

Options.label: B
Options.text: in the SPFILE and in memory

Options.label: C
Options.text: only in memory

Options.label: D
Options.text: only in the SPFILE

Options.label: E
Options.text: in the SPFILE, PFILE, and memory

questions.Explanation: 没有指定 SCOPE，Oracle 默认规则：如果 实例启动使用 SPFILE → 默认修改内存 + SPFILE; 如果 实例启动使用PFILE → 默认修改内存（PFILE 是静态的，不会自动修改）

questions.QuestionText: Which two Oracle database space management features require the use of locally managed tablespaces?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Automatic data file extension (AUTOEXTEND)

Options.label: B
Options.text: Online segment shrink

Options.label: C
Options.text: Free space management with bitmaps

Options.label: D
Options.text: Oracle Managed Files (OMF)

Options.label: E
Options.text: Server-generated tablespace space alerts

questions.Explanation: Locally Managed Tablespace (LMT)使用 位图 (Bitmap) 管理空闲空间,在线收缩 + 位图自由 = LMT 必备

questions.QuestionText: Which compression method is recommended for Direct-Path Insert operations?

Options.label: A
Options.text: COLUMN STORE COMPRESS ADVANCED

Options.label: B
Options.text: ROW STORE COMPRESS BASIC

Options.label: C
Options.text: COLUMN STORE COMPRESS BASIC

Options.label: D
Options.text: ROW STORE COMPRESS ADVANCED

questions.Explanation:
ROW STORE COMPRESS BASIC;用于常规 DML 操作;压缩插入前的行，节省存储空间
ROW STORE COMPRESS ADVANCED 用于OLTP / Direct-Path Insert;支持直接路径插入（Direct-Path Insert），压缩率更高，性能优化
COLUMN STORE COMPRESS BASIC用于OLAP / Columnar；基于列存储，节省存储，适合分析查询
COLUMN STORE COMPRESS ADVANCED;用于OLAP / Columnar;高级列存储压缩，适合混合分析场景

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about the naming methods and their features supported by Oracle database used to resolve connection information?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Directory Naming can be used if Connect-Time Failover is required.

Options.label: B
Options.text: A client can connect to an Oracle database instance even if no client side network admin has been configured.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Directory Naming requires setting the TNS_ADMIN environment variable on the client side.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Local Naming requires setting the TNS_ADMIN environment variable on the client side.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Easy Connect supports TCP/IP and SSL.

Options.label: F
Options.text: Local naming can be used if Connect-Time Failover is required.

questions.Explanation:
--Local Naming:使用 tnsnames.ora 文件，客户端解析服务名;可支持Connect-Time Failover;需要配置 tnsnames.ora
--Directory Naming:使用 LDAP（Oracle Internet Directory, OID）存储服务名;可支持Connect-Time Failover;需要客户端指向 LDAP，设置 TNS_ADMIN / LDAP_ADMIN
--Easy Connect:简单方式，直接用 hostname:port/service_name;不支持复杂 Connect-Time Failover;无需 tnsnames.ora; Easy Connect 主要是 TCP/IP 直连，不原生支持SSL(Secure Sockets Layer是一种安全传输协议)
--External Naming:OS 级别名称解析;可选Connect-Time Failover;依赖操作系统
Connect-Time Failover（在客户端重试另一节点）只有 Local Naming 和 Directory Naming 支持

B.使用 Easy Connect，客户端无需 tnsnames.ora 或 LDAP，即可通过
D.TNS_ADMIN 是可选的，用于指定 tnsnames.ora 的位置，如果放在默认路径下（$ORACLE_HOME/network/admin），不必设置

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about using SQL*Plus?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It can run Recovery Manager (RMAN) commands.

Options.label: B
Options.text: It can run scripts passed to it by a shell script.

Options.label: C
Options.text: It can run scripts entered at the SQL prompt.

Options.label: D
Options.text: It has its own commands that are separate from any SQL statements.

Options.label: E
Options.text: It has both command-line and graphical user interfaces (GUI).

Options.label: F
Options.text: It must be downloaded from the Oracle Technology Network (OTN).

questions.Explanation:
SQL*Plus 是 Oracle 提供的命令行工具，用于执行 SQL、PL/SQL 语句，同时有自己独立的命令（如 SET, SPOOL, SHOW）。它可以运行脚本、交互式执行 SQL，也可以通过操作系统的 shell 脚本批量执行 SQL 脚本
A.RMAN 有自己的客户端工具（rman），不能通过 SQL*Plus 直接执行 RMAN 命令。SQL*Plus 只能执行 SQL、PL/SQL 和自身命令
F.SQL*Plus 已经随 Oracle Database 或 Oracle Client 安装包一起提供，无需单独下载

questions.QuestionText: Which three activities are recorded in the database alert log?

Options.label: A
Options.text: session logins and logouts

Options.label: B
Options.text: deadlock errors

Options.label: C
Options.text: block corruption errors

Options.label: D
Options.text: non-default database parameters

Options.label: E
Options.text: Data Definition Language (DDL) statements

questions.Explanation:
Alert Log（警告日志）记“大事”:记录实例级重大事件和错误;Trace File（跟踪文件）查“细节”:记录后台进程或用户会话的详细诊断信息;Audit Log（审计日志）管“人事”:记录用户行为，用于安全审计
alert log 会记录的内容:1.启动与关闭信息:实例启动、关闭
2.重大错误事件:ORA-600、ORA-7445、block corruption
3.后台进程错误:SMON、DBWn、LGWR、ARCn 等进程错误
4.参数更改:修改了非默认参数（例如 ALTER SYSTEM SET）
5.结构性变更:表空间或数据文件增加/移动
6.警告或告警信息:空间不足、归档失败等

questions.QuestionText:
You must create a tablespace of non-standard block size in a new file system and plan to use this command:

CREATE TABLESPACE ns_tbs
DATAFILE '/u02/oracle/data/nstbs_f01.dbf'
SIZE 100G
BLOCKSIZE 32K;

The standard block size is 8K but other non-standard block sizes will also be used.

Which two are requirements for this command to succeed?

Options.label: A
Options.text: DB_32K_CACHE_SIZE must be set to a value that can be accommodated in the SGA.

Options.label: B
Options.text: DB_32K_CACHE_SIZE must be less than DB_CACHE_SIZE.

Options.label: C
Options.text: DB_32K_CACHE_SIZE should be set to a value greater than DB_CACHE_SIZE.

Options.label: D
Options.text: The operating system must use a 32K block size.

Options.label: E
Options.text: The /u02 file system must have at least 100G space for the datafile.

Options.label: F
Options.text: DB_CACHE_SIZE must be set to a size that is smaller than DB_32K_CACHE_SIZE.

questions.Explanation:
Oracle 数据库允许在同一个数据库中使用多个块大小（multi-block size），但必须满足以下条件：
1.每种非标准块大小都要有对应的 buffer cache。例如：对于 2K 块：DB_2K_CACHE_SIZE对于; 4K 块：DB_4K_CACHE_SIZE
2.每个非标准块缓存参数必须在 SGA 中预先分配内存，否则 Oracle 无法缓存这种块大小的数据页，会报错。
A.因为你要创建一个 BLOCKSIZE 32K 的表空间，Oracle 需要在内存中有一个相应的 32K 缓存区（buffer cache）来缓存这些块。所以你必须在初始化参数文件（spfile/pfile）里设置：ALTER SYSTEM SET DB_32K_CACHE_SIZE = 128M;并且这块内存必须能放入 SGA（系统全局区）。

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about connection strings and service names used to connect to an Oracle database instance?

Options.label: A
Options.text: A connection string must include the SID of a database instance.

Options.label: B
Options.text: A single connection string can refer to multiple database instances.

Options.label: C
Options.text: A connection string including a service name must be defined in the tnsnames.ora file.

Options.label: D
Options.text: A service name is created by a listener.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Different connection strings in the same tnsnames.ora file can contain the same service name, host and port parameters.

Options.label: F
Options.text: A single database instance can support connections for multiple service names.

questions.Explanation:
Connection string就是用来告诉客户端如何连接到数据库的一串信息。数据库的地址（host/IP）端口号（port，Oracle 默认 1521）服务名或 SID（指定要连接哪个数据库实例）有时还包括用户名和密码（可选）
在 Oracle 中，连接数据库有两种常用方式：1.使用 SID：直接指定某个实例的系统标识符（SID）。2.使用 Service Name：更灵活，允许一个实例提供多个服务或支持 RAC 环境。
B.在 RAC（Real Application Clusters） 环境下，一个 service name 可以对应多个实例。
D.服务名由数据库实例通过动态注册或静态配置（listener.ora）提供给监听器，而非由监听器创建。

questions.QuestionText:
Examine this command:

SQL> ALTER TABLE ORDERS SHRINK SPACE COMPACT

Which two statements are true?

Options.label: A
Options.text: The high-water mark (HWM) of ORDERS is adjusted.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Only queries are allowed on ORDERS while the SHRINK is executing.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Dependent indexes become UNUSABLE.

Options.label: D
Options.text: The SHRINK operation causes rows to be moved to empty space starting from the beginning of the ORDERS segment.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Queries and DML statements are allowed on ORDERS while the SHRINK is executing.

Options.label: F
Options.text: The SHRINK operation causes rows to be moved to empty space starting toward the end of the ORDERS segment.

questions.Explanation:
A.使用 COMPACT 只是压缩数据，不会立即调整 HWM。HWM 只有在执行 SHRINK SPACE（不加 COMPACT）或者执行 SHRINK SPACE 后的第二步时才会下降;SHRINK SPACE COMPACT = “先压缩，不回收”;SHRINK SPACE= “压缩 + 回收空间（降低 HWM）”
B.SHRINK SPACE COMPACT 允许查询和DML，所以不仅仅是查询。
C.SHRINK SPACE对索引是透明的，表的索引不会被破坏，也不会变为不可用，你不需要对索引做任何额外操作；SHRINK SPACE 会移动表里的数据行（从段尾向前压缩空闲空间），但 Oracle 会自动维护索引指向行的 OWID，保证索引依然正确指向对应的行。SHRINK SPACE CASCADE索引段也收缩，释放空间
D.行是从 段的末尾往前移动，以压缩尾部空闲空间

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about Database Instances and Real Application Clusters (RAC)?

Options.label: A
Options.text: A RAC database can have instances on separate servers.

Options.label: B
Options.text: A RAC database must have two or more instances.

Options.label: C
Options.text: A RAC database must have three or more instances.

Options.label: D
Options.text: A RAC database can have one instance.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Two RAC databases can share their instances.

questions.Explanation:
A.RAC 的核心就是 多实例、多节点，每个实例运行在不同的服务器上，但访问同一个数据库（共享存储）。
E.一个实例只能属于一个数据库，不同 RAC 数据库不能共享实例。

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about Deferred Segment Creation in Oracle databases?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It is supported for Index Organized Tables (IOTs) contained in locally managed tablespaces.

Options.label: B
Options.text: It is supported for sys-owned tables contained in locally managed tablespaces.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Sessions may dynamically switch back and forth from DEFERRED to IMMEDIATE segment creation.

Options.label: D
Options.text: It is the default behavior for tables and indexes.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Indexes inherit the DEFERRED or IMMEDIATE segment creation attribute from their parent table.

questions.Explanation:
延迟段创建不支持的表类型包括：
① 索引组织表（Index-Organized Tables）、簇表（Clustered Tables）、全局临时表（Global Temporary Tables）、会话级临时表（Session-Specific TemporaryTables）、内部表（Internal Tables）、Typed表（Typed Tables）、AQ表（AQ Tables）和外部表（External Tables）。
② 用户SYS、SYSTEM、PUBLIC、OUTLN和XDB下的表不支持延迟段创建。
③ 延迟段创建不支持位图连接索引（Bitmap Join Indexes）和域索引（DomainIndexes）。
④ 延迟段创建不支持字典管理表空间（Dictionary-Managed Tablespace，DMT）。
⑤ 延迟段创建不支持SYSTEM表空间。
⑥ 延迟段创建从Oracle 11.2.0.2版本开始才开始支持分区和子分区。

C.ALTER SESSION SET deferred_segment_creation = FALSE(TRUE → 默认 DEFERRED;FALSE → 默认 IMMEDIATE)
D.从 Oracle 12c 开始，延迟段创建是 新表和索引的默认行为。
E.索引在创建时会继承父表的段创建策略，除非显式指定。

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about the Automatic Diagnostic Repository (ADR)?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It is a file-based repository held outside any database.

Options.label: B
Options.text: It is held inside an Oracle database schema.

Options.label: C
Options.text: The ADR base is specified in the DIAGNOSTIC_DEST database parameter.

Options.label: D
Options.text: It is only used for Oracle Database diagnostic information.

Options.label: E
Options.text: It can be used for problem diagnosis of a database when that database's instance is down.

questions.Explanation:
ADR 是 Oracle 用来存储诊断信息（如 警报日志、跟踪文件、核心转储）的统一文件系统仓库。ADR独立于数据库，不在数据库schema 内。ADR 支持数据库实例即使未启动时的故障诊断；ADR根目录 = DIAGNOSTIC_DEST，每个实例一个子目录，里面有 alert log、trace、incident 等
D.ADR 还可以存储 Oracle ASM、Listener等其他Oracle 产品的诊断信息。

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about User Authentication in an Oracle Database?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Password File authentication is supported for any type of database user.

Options.label: B
Options.text: REMOTE_LOGIN_PASSWORDFILE must be set to exclusive to permit password changes for system-privileged administrative users.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Operating System authentication may be used for system-privileged administrative users.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Password authentication must be used for system-privileged administrative users.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Password File authentication must be used for system-privileged administrative users.

questions.Explanation:
Oracle 数据库支持几种认证方式：
--1.Password File Authentication（密码文件认证）:用于远程管理员连接（如 SYSDBA、SYSOPER）;需要 REMOTE_LOGIN_PASSWORDFILE 参数配置;只支持系统管理员用户（SYSDBA、SYSOPER），普通数据库用户不能通过密码文件认证;
--2.Operating System Authentication（操作系统认证）:通过操作系统用户身份验证数据库管理员;适用于本地登录（如 / as sysdba）
--3.Database Password Authentication（数据库密码认证）:数据库内部用户使用自己的密码登录
B.只有 EXCLUSIVE 模式允许系统管理员用户更新密码并管理密码文件。
D.系统管理员可以使用 操作系统认证 或 密码文件认证，不一定非要数据库密码。

questions.QuestionText: Which set operator generates the required output?

Options.label: A
Options.text: SUBTRACT

Options.label: B
Options.text: UNION ALL

Options.label: C
Options.text: INTERSECT

Options.label: D
Options.text: UNION

Options.label: E
Options.text: MINUS

questions.QuestionText: Which three resource limits can be configured using Oracle profiles?

Options.label: A
Options.text: limiting connect time for user sessions

Options.label: B
Options.text: limiting CPU used by a user

Options.label: C
Options.text: limiting idle time for user sessions only when blocking other sessions

Options.label: D
Options.text: limiting idle time for user sessions only when not blocking other sessions

Options.label: E
Options.text: limiting idle time for user sessions

Options.label: F
Options.text: limiting CPU used by a session

questions.Explanation: IDLE_TIME → 只看会话空闲时间，不关心是否阻塞其他会话。

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about unexpired undo?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It is required when a transaction issues a ROLLBACK statement.

Options.label: B
Options.text: It is the first type of UNDO overwritten when trying to avoid out-of-space errors.

Options.label: C
Options.text: It may be used to support flashback queries.

Options.label: D
Options.text: It is retained if possible for the time specified in UNDO_RETENTION.

Options.label: E
Options.text: It consists of UNDO only for uncommitted transactions.

questions.Explanation:
A.ROLLBACK当事务发现错误;需要撤销自己做的修改;只能撤销当前事务未提交的修改,依赖active undo;FLASHBACK回溯历史数据，修复已提交的数据错误;可以查看表、行在某一时间点的状态;不影响其他会话事务,依赖Unexpired Undo / Flashback日志
B.Oracle 优先覆盖 Expired Undo，而不是未过期 Undo
C.Flashback 查询依赖 未过期 Undo 来重建过去的表数据。

questions.QuestionText: Which three are benefits of using temp UNDO when performing DML on global temporary tables?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It reduces I/Os to the SYSTEM tablespace.

Options.label: B
Options.text: It reduces the amount of redo generated.

Options.label: C
Options.text: It reduces the amount of UNDO stored in the UNDO tablespace.

Options.label: D
Options.text: It permits DML on Global temporary tables even if the database is opened read only.

Options.label: E
Options.text: It reduces I/Os to the SYSAUX tablespace.

questions.Explanation:
A.GTT数据和临时Undo不涉及SYSTEM表空间
B.对临时表的DML通常不会生成redo（或只生成最少 redo），提高性能
C.使用临时Undo，GTT的DML不占用普通Undo表空间。、D.当temp UNDO被启用时，在物理备用数据库（standby）场景下，对GTT的DML是允许的。
E.SYSAUX 表空间和GTT临时Undo无关

questions.QuestionText: You start your database instance in NOMOUNT state. Which two actions are performed?

Options.label: A
Options.text: The control files are opened.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Memory is allocated for the SGA.

Options.label: C
Options.text: SYS can access the database.

Options.label: D
Options.text: All required background processes are started.

Options.label: E
Options.text: The consistency of the database is checked.

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about UNDO and REDO?

Options.label: A
Options.text: UNDO is used for some flashback operations.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Both REDO and UNDO can be multiplexed.

Options.label: C
Options.text: UNDO is used for read consistency.

Options.label: D
Options.text: REDO is used for ROLLBACK.

Options.label: E
Options.text: REDO is used for read consistency.

Options.label: F
Options.text: REDO is used for instance recovery.

questions.Explanation: B.只有 Redo Log 可以 multiplex（多路复用，多份备份、同时写入多个文件），即保存多份副本来防止丢失。

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about Resumable Space Allocation in Oracle databases?

Options.label: A
Options.text: All sessions must have the same timeout value when waiting for resumable space allocations.

Options.label: B
Options.text: A user's session may be suspended and resumed multiple times.

Options.label: C
Options.text: A user's session may be suspended even if the user has the UNLIMITED TABLESPACE system privilege.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Resumable space allocation is only possible with locally managed tablespaces.

Options.label: E
Options.text: The AFTER SUSPEND event trigger can itself be suspended due to space conditions.

Options.label: F
Options.text: Resumable space allocation may be enabled for some sessions and not others.

questions.Explanation:
Resumable Space Allocation可恢复空间分配:就是 Oracle 在执行 DML 时，遇到“空间不够”的情况不会立刻报错中断，而是暂停（suspend）一会儿，等你处理完问题（比如加表空间）再自动继续执行（resume）。
A.超时值（TIMEOUT）通过 ALTER SESSION 单独设置，各会话可不同
B.同一个会话可能在不同时间点多次暂停再恢复。比如：1.第一次空间满了 → 暂停 → DBA 加表空间 → 恢复。2.过一会儿又满了 → 再次暂停 → 再加空间 → 又恢复。
C.就算用户有 UNLIMITED TABLESPACE（无限表空间权限），也可能因为其他资源（比如临时表空间 temp、UNDO 表空间）满了而被暂停。所以这个 privilege 不保证永远不会suspend。
D.可恢复空间分配与表空间管理方式无关，支持字典管理和本地管理表空间。
E.该触发器执行时若空间不足，会直接失败（报错），而非被暂停
F.这个特性是按会话启用的，不是全局强制

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about Private Temporary Tables (PTTs) in an Oracle Database?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Concurrent sessions may have PTTS with the same name and the same column definitions.

Options.label: B
Options.text: It is possible to preserve the private table definition but remove the rows when a session with a PTT issues a COMMIT.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Creating a PTT is DDL and commits any active transaction for the session.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Concurrent sessions may have PTTS with the same name but different column definitions.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Concurrent sessions may have PTTS with different names but same column definitions.

questions.Explanation:
Private Temporary Table (PTT)只对创建它的会话可见（Session-private）;结构在 会话结束后自动消失;数据存储在 临时表空间，使用类似 Global Temporary Table 的机制;允许同一个数据库不同会话创建 同名或不同名的 PTT，互不干扰;PTT 是 DDL 操作（CREATE TABLE），但它在会话结束时自动消失，不需要手动 DROP
B.PTT的数据行为取决于 ON COMMIT 子句，但和 GTT 有点不同：ON COMMIT PRESERVE DEFINITION（默认行为）:表结构会保留,数据也会保留,COMMIT 后表依然存在，数据不丢失; ON COMMIT DROP DEFINITION:表结构和数据都会在事务 COMMIT 时消失相当于提交就自动 DROP
C.PTT 确实是 DDL，但在 Oracle 中 CREATE PRIVATE TEMPORARY TABLE 不会提交当前事务，这与普通 CREATE TABLE 不同（普通 CREATE TABLE 会隐式提交）。

questions.QuestionText: Choose the best answer. Why would you use the TNSPING hr command?

Options.label: A
Options.text: to verify if a requested service is available

Options.label: B
Options.text: to determine if the listener for the HR net service name can be reached

Options.label: C
Options.text: to verify if the HR database instance is up

Options.label: D
Options.text: to check and list multiple ORACLE_HOME locations on the server

Options.label: E
Options.text: to validate the network connectivity between a client and the database instance

questions.Explanation: TNSPING 是 Oracle 提供的一个网络诊断工具，用来检查 Oracle Net 服务是否可达。它不会尝试连接数据库实例，只检查 Listener是否可以访问。常用于排查网络问题或Listener 配置问题

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about the UNLIMITED TABLESPACE system privilege and space quotas?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It is overridden by a space quota specified for the user.

Options.label: B
Options.text: It allows a user to have unlimited space in any tablespace in the database.

Options.label: C
Options.text: By default, users have no quota on their default permanent tablespace.

Options.label: D
Options.text: It allows a user to have unlimited space only in their default permanent tablespace.

Options.label: E
Options.text: It allows a role to have unlimited space in any tablespace in the database.

questions.Explanation:
UNLIMITED TABLESPACE 系统权限用于控制用户在数据库中能使用的空间量。空间配额（space quota） 用于限制用户在某个特定表空间中能使用的空间。
C.默认情况下，如果没有显式分配配额，用户在默认永久表空间 没有配额限制。注意：这并不是“无限”，只是“未分配配额”，可能依赖于表空间剩余空间
E.UNLIMITED TABLESPACE是授予用户的权限，不是直接授予角色的

questions.QuestionText: Which three files are used by conventional path SQL*Loader when the TABLE option is not specified?

Options.label: A
Options.text: password files

Options.label: B
Options.text: dump files

Options.label: C
Options.text: input files

Options.label: D
Options.text: control files

Options.label: E
Options.text: bad files

questions.Explanation:
SQL*Loader 是 Oracle 提供的 批量加载工具，用来把外部数据文件（比如 CSV、文本文件）快速导入数据库表。它主要有两种路径:
--1.Conventional Path：使用 INSERT 语句逐行加载数据，适用于大多数情况。
--2.Direct Path：直接将数据写入数据文件，绕过 SQL 层，更快，但有一些限制。
conventional path会生成大量INSERT语句，每条都走SQL引擎。Direct path 直接把数据写入表数据块，不走SQL语句。

C.就是你要加载的数据文件。例如：data.csv 或 data.txt
D.告诉 SQL*Loader 如何解析数据文件和插入数据的规则
E.记录加载失败的行（格式错误、违反约束等）。默认生成：*.bad 文件，用于排查错误

questions.QuestionText: Which four activities can be performed using SQL Developer?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It must be configured to allow SQLcl to be used.

Options.label: B
Options.text: It can be used to develop server-side java programs.

Options.label: C
Options.text: It can be used to back up and recover databases using RMAN.

Options.label: D
Options.text: It can be used to administer database security.

Options.label: E
Options.text: It can run SQL statements and SQL scripts.

Options.label: F
Options.text: It can be used to debug PL/SQL programs.

Options.label: G
Options.text: It can be used to develop client-side java programs.

questions.Explanation:
A.SQLcl是 Oracle的命令行SQL工具，可以和SQL Developer配合，但SQL Developer本身不依赖 SQLcl。
B.SQL Developer的 Java 功能主要是 客户端辅助工具，而不是完整的服务器端开发环境。
C.SQL Developer可以集成RMAN（Recovery Manager），允许可视化地执行备份和恢复任务。
D.通过 SQL Developer 管理用户、角色、权限和安全策略

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about Enterprise Manager Cloud Control?

Options.label: A
Options.text: It is available to manage a database only when that database is open.

Options.label: B
Options.text: It is integrated with My Oracle Support.

Options.label: C
Options.text: It provides management for Oracle middleware.

Options.label: D
Options.text: It provides management for Oracle-engineered systems.

Options.label: E
Options.text: It uses a web-based console built into the Oracle database using XML DB.

questions.Explanation:
A.EM可以管理 开/关状态的数据库，但通常只能监控已打开的数据库实例
B.EM Cloud Control 内置与 My Oracle Support (MOS) 集成;可以直接在控制台查看补丁信息、错误单、建议等
C.EM可以管理 Oracle 中间件产品（如 WebLogic、Fusion Middleware、SOA 等;中间件 = 应用程序和操作系统/数据库之间的“中间层”软件,连接前端和后端：比如 Web 页面（前端）要访问数据库（后端），中间件负责传输请求和结果;提供公共服务：事务管理、安全认证、消息队列、负载均衡等;让应用开发更方便：开发者不用每次都从零处理网络通信、数据库连接、事务管理等
E.EM Cloud Control 使用独立的 Web 控制台,通常部署在OMS:Oracle Management Server 上），不是内置在数据库里。内置 XML DB 控制台属于 Database Express (DB Express)，与 Cloud Control 不同。

questions.QuestionText: Which three are types of segments in an Oracle Database?

Options.label: A
Options.text: tables

Options.label: B
Options.text: stored procedures

Options.label: C
Options.text: sequences

Options.label: D
Options.text: views

Options.label: E
Options.text: undo

Options.label: F
Options.text: clusters

questions.Explanation:
常见的 Segment 类型：
--1.表段（Table Segment）：存储表数据
--2.索引段（Index Segment）：存储索引数据
--3.Undo 段（Undo Segment）：存储撤销信息（用于事务回滚）
--4.集群段（Cluster Segment）：多个表共享的数据块
--5.临时段（Temporary Segment）：临时表或排序操作使用
段是数据库中 物理存储的最小单位之一，与表、索引等对象密切相关。

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true regarding indexes?

Options.label: A
Options.text: A table belonging to one user cannot have an index that belongs to a different user.

Options.label: B
Options.text: When a table is dropped and is moved to the RECYCLE BIN, all indexes built on that table are permanently dropped.

Options.label: C
Options.text: An update to a table can result in updates to any or all of the table's indexes.

Options.label: D
Options.text: An update to a table can result in no updates to any of the table's indexes.

Options.label: E
Options.text: A UNIQUE index can be altered to be non-unique.

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements about Oracle SQL functions are true?

Options.label: C
Options.text: CONCAT joins two or more character strings together.

Options.label: D

Options.label: E

questions.QuestionText:
Examine this schema information:
1.EMPLOYEES.DEPARTMENT_ID has a foreign key referencing 
DEPARTMENTS.DEPARTMENT_ID.
2.EMP_VIEW is based on the EMPLOYEES and DEPARTMENTS tables.
3.EMP_VIEW has columns EMPLOYEE_ID, EMPLOYEE_NAME and DEPARTMENT_NAME.
You must add a new column, MANAGER_ID, from the EMPLOYEES table, to the view, showing each employee's manager.
Which statement will do this?

Options.label: A
Options.text:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW emp_view AS 
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department_name, manager_id 
FROM employees e, departments d 
WHERE e.department_id = d.department_id;

Options.label: B
Options.text: ALTER VIEW emp_view ADD (employee.manager_id);

Options.label: C
Options.text:
ALTER VIEW emp_view MODIFY 
(SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department_name, manager_id 
FROM employees e, departments d 
WHERE e.department_id = d.department_id);

Options.label: D
Options.text: ALTER VIEW emp_view ADD (SELECT manager_id FROM employees);

questions.Explanation: 视图不能进行 alter，只能重建。

Options.label: A
Options.text: SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'Ma*';

Options.label: D

Options.label: E

Options.label: F

questions.QuestionText:
Choose the best answer.
You need to allow user ANDREW to:
1. Modify the TITLE and ADDRESS columns of your CUSTOMERS table.
2. GRANT that permission to other users.
Which statement will do this?

Options.label: A
Options.text: GRANT UPDATE ON customers.title, customers.address TO andrew;

Options.label: B
Options.text: GRANT UPDATE (title, address) ON customers TO andrew WITH GRANT OPTION;

Options.label: C
Options.text: GRANT UPDATE ON customers.title, customers.address TO andrew WITH ADMIN OPTION;

Options.label: D
Options.text: GRANT UPDATE ON customers.title, customers.address TO andrew WITH GRANT OPTION;

Options.label: E
Options.text: GRANT UPDATE (title, address) ON customers TO andrew;

Options.label: F
Options.text: GRANT UPDATE (title, address) ON customers TO andrew WITH ADMIN OPTION;

questions.Explanation: 对象权限允许授权只能用WITH GRANT OPTION）系统权限允许授权可用with admin option

questions.QuestionText:
Choose the best answer.
Which statement is true about TRUNCATE and DELETE?

Options.label: A
Options.text: You can never TRUNCATE a table if foreign key constraints would be violated.

Options.label: B
Options.text: You can DELETE rows from a table with referential integrity constraints.

Options.label: C
Options.text: For tables with multiple indexes and triggers, DELETE is faster than TRUNCATE.

Options.label: D
Options.text: For large tables, DELETE is faster than TRUNCATE.

questions.Explanation:
A.如果该表是被其他表通过外键 “引用”的（即它是parent表），而这些外键约束是启用状态的，那么不能直接TRUNCATE。你必须先禁用(或者删除)那些引用该表的外键约束，或者使用TRUNCATE … CASCADE,并且那些外键必须支持ON DELETE CASCADE才行。
B.DELETE 可以删除有外键约束的表中的数据，只要删除不会违反referential integrity（参照完整性），就可以。
CD.DELETE 会逐行删除，大表操作很慢；TRUNCATE直接释放数据块，非常快

questions.QuestionText: Which two are true about constraints?

Options.label: A
Options.text: All constraints can be defined at the table or column level.

Options.label: B
Options.text: A constraint can be disabled even if the constrained column contains data.

Options.label: C
Options.text: A column with a FOREIGN KEY constraint can never contain a NULL value.

Options.label: D
Options.text: A column with a UNIQUE constraint can contain a NULL value.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Constraints are enforced only during INSERT operations.

questions.Explanation:
A.Not Null仅仅能定义在列级别
C.外键列是允许 NULL 的，表示该行没有关联到 parent 表的任何记录
D.UNIQUE约束允许列中存在NULL，并且多个NULL被视为不同值，所以不会违反唯一性
E.约束不仅在INSERT时检查，也在UPDATE 时检查，甚至可能在DELETE时触发（如外键约束）

questions.QuestionText: Which three are true about privileges?

Options.label: A
Options.text: All schema objects have associated object privileges.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Schema owners can grant any object privilege on any object in their schema to any other user or role.

Options.label: C
Options.text: A combination of object and system privileges can be granted to a role.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Object privileges granted on a table automatically apply to all synonyms for that table.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Only users with the GRANT ANY PRIVILEGE privilege can grant and revoke system privileges from other users.

Options.label: F
Options.text: Only users with the DBA role can create roles.

questions.Explanation:
C.角色（role） 可以被授予 对象权限 或 系统权限，但不能同时授予系统权限和对象权限的组合（必须分别授予）
E.并非只有拥有 GRANT ANY PRIVILEGE 的用户才能授予系统权限；拥有某个系统权限的用户，如果带有 WITH ADMIN OPTION，也可以授予该权限给其他用户
F.创建角色（CREATE ROLE）需要CREATE ROLE系统权限，并非必须是DBA角色

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about dropping views?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Read only views cannot be dropped.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Views referencing a dropped view become invalid.

Options.label: C
Options.text: CASCADE CONSTRAINTS must be specified when referential integrity constraints on other objects refer to primary or unique keys in the view to be dropped.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Data selected by a view's defining query is deleted from its underlying tables when the view is dropped.

Options.label: E
Options.text: The creator of a view to be dropped must have the DROP ANY VIEW privilege.

questions.Explanation:
A.只读视图read-only view可以正常被DROP
E.视图的创建者自己可以直接DROP VIEW view_name;，不需要DROP ANY VIEW权限。DROP ANY VIEW是为了删除别人的视图

questions.QuestionText: Which two are true?

Options.label: A
Options.text: The MGR column in the DEPT table will not be able to contain NULL values.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Both foreign key constraint definitions must be removed from the CREATE TABLE statements, and be added with ALTER TABLE statements once both tables are created, for the two CREATE TABLE statements to execute successfully in the order shown.

Options.label: C
Options.text: The CREATE TABLE EMP statement must precede the CREATE TABLE DEPT statement for all three statements to execute successfully.

Options.label: D
Options.text: The DEPTNO column in the EMP table will be able to contain NULL values.

Options.label: E
Options.text: All three statements execute successfully in the order shown.

Options.label: F
Options.text: The DEPT_FKEY constraint definition must be removed from the CREATE TABLE DEPT statement, and be added with an ALTER TABLE statement once both tables are created, for the two CREATE TABLE statements to execute successfully in the order shown.

questions.Explanation:
这里有两个约束涉及外键:
1.EMP.DEPTNO 外键指向 DEPT.DEPTNO
2.DEPT.MGR 外键指向 EMP.EMPNO
这就是所谓的 循环依赖（circular reference），也叫双向外键。
A.外键列默认可以包含 NULL（除非显式加 NOT NULL）
B.第一步创建DEPT时，Oracle会检查外键DEPT_FKEY，它引用EMP.EMPNO。但是EMP还没创建，所以这个外键会报错,不完全需要去掉两个外键; DEPT.MGR外键必须延后用ALTER TABLE添加，因为它引用的 EMP 还不存在。另一个外键可以正常创建;EMP.DEPTNO外键引用 DEPT，DEPT已经创建，可以直接在CREATE TABLE 时定义

Options.label: A

Options.label: B

Options.label: C

questions.QuestionText: Which three actions can you perform only with system privileges?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Access flat files via a database, which are stored in an operating system directory.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Execute a procedure in another schema.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Log in to a database instance.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Create stored procedures, functions and packages.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Use the WITH GRANT OPTION clause.

Options.label: F
Options.text: Query any table in a database.

questions.Explanation:
系统权：登录数据库、建表/存储过程、跨库查询、WITH ADMIN OPTION → 需要系统权限
对象权：操作自己表、执行自己/别人存储过程、WITH GRANT OPTION → 对象权限足够

A.Oracle中访问文件需要CREATE DIRECTORY 权限以及 READ/WRITE 权限，属于对象权限/目录权限，不是标准系统权限
B.执行其他 schema 的存储过程需要 对象权限（EXECUTE ON schema.proc），不是系统权限
E.WITH GRANT OPTION 是 对象权限 的扩展，用于授予权限给其他用户，不属于系统权限

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about an Oracle database?

Options.label: A
Options.text: A NUMBER column without data has a zero value.

Options.label: B
Options.text: A table can have multiple foreign keys.

Options.label: C
Options.text: A VARCHAR2 column without data has a NULL value.

Options.label: D
Options.text: A table can have multiple primary keys.

Options.label: E
Options.text: A column definition can specify multiple data types.

questions.QuestionText: Which statement satisfies all the requirements?

Options.label: A
Options.text:
SELECT last_name, hire_date, 
(CASE WHEN (SYSDATE - TO_YMINTERVAL('15-0')) >= hire_date THEN '15+ years of service' 
WHEN (SYSDATE - TO_YMINTERVAL('10-0')) >= hire_date THEN '10+ years of service' 
WHEN (SYSDATE - TO_YMINTERVAL('5-0')) >= hire_date THEN '5+ years of service' 
ELSE '<5 years of service' 
END) AS years 
FROM employees 
ORDER BY hire_date;

Options.label: B
Options.text:
SELECT last_name, hire_date, 
(CASE WHEN (SYSDATE - hire_date) >= TO_YMINTERVAL('5-0') THEN '5+ years of service' 
WHEN (SYSDATE - hire_date) >= TO_YMINTERVAL('10-0') THEN '10+ years of service' 
WHEN (SYSDATE - hire_date) >= TO_YMINTERVAL('15-0') THEN '15+ years of service' 
ELSE '<5 years of service' 
END) AS years 
FROM employees 
ORDER BY hire_date;

Options.label: C
Options.text:
SELECT last_name, hire_date, 
(CASE WHEN (SYSDATE - TO_YMINTERVAL('5-0')) >= hire_date THEN '5+ years of service' 
WHEN (SYSDATE - TO_YMINTERVAL('10-0')) >= hire_date THEN '10+ years of service' 
WHEN (SYSDATE - TO_YMINTERVAL('15-0')) >= hire_date THEN '15+ years of service' 
ELSE '<5 years of service' 
END) AS years 
FROM employees 
ORDER BY hire_date;

Options.label: D
Options.text:
SELECT last_name, hire_date, 
(CASE WHEN (SYSDATE - hire_date) >= TO_YMINTERVAL('15-0') THEN '15+ years of service' 
WHEN (SYSDATE - hire_date) >= TO_YMINTERVAL('10-0') THEN '10+ years of service' 
WHEN (SYSDATE - hire_date) >= TO_YMINTERVAL('5-0') THEN '5+ years of service' 
ELSE '<5 years of service' 
END) AS years 
FROM employees 
ORDER BY hire_date;

questions.Explanation:
TO_YMINTERVAL 是 Oracle SQL 的一个函数，用于 将字符串或数字转换为 INTERVAL YEAR TO MONTH 类型，即表示“年-月”间隔的数据类型
BD.(SYSDATE - hire_date) >= TO_YMINTERVAL('15-0');SYSDATE - hire_date 返回的是 天数（NUMBER 类型）;TO_YMINTERVAL('15-0') 是 INTERVAL YEAR TO MONTH 类型

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about external tables?

Options.label: A
Options.text: They can be used in queries containing joins.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Their metadata is stored in the database.

Options.label: C
Options.text: They can be temporary tables.

Options.label: D
Options.text: They can be indexed.

Options.label: E
Options.text: They can be used in queries containing sorts.

Options.label: F
Options.text: DML statements can modify them.

questions.Explanation:
A.外部表External Tables本质上是 Oracle 数据库中的表定义，只不过数据存储在操作系统的外部文件里（如 CSV、文本文件）。可以像普通表一样在 SELECT 查询中做JOIN
B.外部表的表结构（列名、数据类型等）存储在数据库的数据字典中，而数据本身在外部文件
C.外部表 不支持 TEMPORARY，不能像GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLE那样只在会话或事务内存在
D.外部表不能创建索引，因为数据不在数据库内部，Oracle 无法直接维护索引
F.外部表只读，不支持INSERT、UPDATE 或 DELETE

questions.QuestionText: Which two will execute successfully?

Options.label: A
Options.text: SELECT NVL('DATE', SYSDATE) FROM DUAL;

Options.label: B
Options.text: SELECT COALESCE('DATE', SYSDATE) FROM DUAL;

Options.label: C
Options.text: SELECT COALESCE('DATE', SYSDATE) FROM (SELECT NULL AS "DATE" FROM DUAL);

Options.label: D
Options.text: SELECT COALESCE(0, SYSDATE) FROM DUAL;

Options.label: E
Options.text: SELECT NVL('DATE', 200) FROM (SELECT NULL AS "DATE" FROM DUAL);

questions.Explanation: NVL要求两个参数的数据类型必须一致，或者第二个参数可以被隐式转换为第一个参数的类型;COALESCE两个参数的数据类型必须一致

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about the data dictionary?

Options.label: A
Options.text: The data dictionary does not store metadata in tables.

Options.label: B
Options.text: The data dictionary is accessible when the database is closed.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Views with the prefix ALL_, DBA_ and USER_ are not all available for every type of metadata.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Views with the prefix ALL_ display metadata for objects to which the current user has access.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Views with the prefix DBA_ display only metadata for objects in the SYS schema.

questions.Explanation:
A.Oracle的数据字典元数据是存储在系统表中的。只是访问方式通常通过视图，而不是直接操作这些表
B.数据字典是数据库的一部分，当数据库 关闭时，无法访问
C.并非所有元数据类型都有三种视图（USER_ / ALL_ / DBA_）。
D.ALL_ 视图显示:当前用户拥有的对象;以及当前用户被授权访问的对象
E.DBA_ 视图显示整个数据库中所有用户的对象，不仅仅是SYS。但前提是你必须拥有SELECT ANY DICTIONARY或DBA权限

questions.QuestionText: Which two are true about external tables that use the ORACLE_DATAPUMP access driver?

Options.label: B

Options.label: C

questions.Explanation:
B.创建外部表必须提前创建目录,不会自动创建目录
D.Oracle 明确表示不仅可用于同一个数据库，还 可以用于 不同数据库。也就是说：可以跨数据库使用这些 dump 文件

questions.QuestionText: Which two are true about using constraints?

questions.QuestionText: Which two queries can be used?

Options.text:

Options.text: The FOR UPDATE clause cannot be specified.

Options.label: C
Options.text: The name of each column in the first SELECT list must match the name of the corresponding column in each subsequent SELECT list.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Each SELECT statement in the query can have an ORDER BY clause.

Options.label: E
Options.text: There must be an equal number of columns in each SELECT list.

questions.Explanation:
A.UNION、INTERSECT、MINUS 确实 不支持 CLOB / BLOB 列 的比较。UNION ALL 可以用
B.在使用 UNION / UNION ALL / INTERSECT / MINUS 时，不能使用FOR UPDATE。FOR UPDATE 只用于单个 SELECT 来锁定行，而集合操作符返回的是组合后的结果集，不允许加FOR UPDATE
C.列名不要求完全相同。Oracle只要求列的数据类型可兼容,并且数量相等。返回结果的列名,默认使用第一个 SELECT的列名
D.

questions.QuestionText: Which two join conditions in a FROM clause are non-equijoins?

questions.QuestionText: Which two queries return the highest salary in the table?

questions.QuestionText: Which statement is true about using functions in WHERE and HAVING?

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true?

questions.QuestionText:
TBS1 is a permanent user-defined tablespace. 
Oracle Managed Files (OMF) is not used in this database. 
Examine this command: 

DROP TABLESPACE tbs1; 

Which two will ensure that TBS1 is dropped and its datafiles are deleted from the file system?

Options.label: A
Options.text: TBS1 must not contain any temp files.

Options.label: B
Options.text: TBS1 must be altered READ ONLY.

Options.label: C
Options.text: There must be no uncommitted transactions involving segments stored in TBS1.

Options.label: D
Options.text: TBS1 must be READ WRITE.

Options.label: E
Options.text: The INCLUDING CONTENTS AND DATAFILES clause must be added to the command.

questions.Explanation:
TBS1是永久用户定义表空间;与临时表空间不同,永久表空间存储数据段（表、索引等）
C.DROP TABLESPACE 会删除表空间中的段，如果有 未提交事务 占用表空间，会报错。确保没有活跃事务，才能成功删除表空间及其数据段
E.INCLUDING CONTENTS → 删除表空间内的对象（表、索引等）INCLUDING DATAFILES → 同时删除文件系统上的数据文件（非 OMF 时必需）

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about a dedicated server configuration?

Options.label: A
Options.text: A dedicated server process can be spawned without a listener when using local clients.

Options.label: B
Options.text: A dedicated server process may be reused by a new session after the session using that process terminates.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Each dedicated server process has its own dispatcher process.

Options.label: D
Options.text: A dedicated server process can be spawned by the listener when using local clients.

Options.label: E
Options.text: A dedicated server process communicates directly with a client or middle tier process once the session is established.

Options.label: F
Options.text: The DBA configures the maximum number of dedicated server processes that can share the same dispatcher process.

questions.Explanation:
A.本地连接（bequeath connection） 不需要 Listener，Oracle 可以直接在操作系统上创建专用服务器进程
B.专用服务器进程:专用于当前会话，会话结束后，进程也终止或等待，但不会被新的会话重用（这是共享服务器的特点）
C.Dispatcher 仅在 共享服务器（Shared Server） 中使用，专用服务器配置不需要 dispatcher

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about time zones, date data types, and timestamp data types in an Oracle database?

Options.label: A

Options.label: B
Options.text: A TIMESTAMP WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE data type column is stored in the database using the time zone of the session that inserted the row.

Options.label: C
Options.text: The CURRENT_TIMESTAMP function returns data without time zone information.

Options.label: D
Options.text: The DBTIMEZONE function can return an offset from Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

questions.Explanation: D.如果数据库时区设置为区域名称，DBTIMEZONE返回的不是偏移量，而是名称。 这意味着在某些配置下，它无法返回偏移量。

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about UNDO and UNDO tablespaces?

Options.label: A

Options.label: B
Options.text: UNDO segments are owned by SYSTEM.

Options.label: C
Options.text: There can be only one UNDO tablespace created in a database.

Options.label: E

questions.Explanation:
A.如果 active undo tablespace 突然丢失，实例不会立即 crash，但会报错事务失败或 ORA-01555 等
B.SYS
C.一个数据库可以创建多个 undo tablespace，但每个实例一次只能使用一个
D.在RAC 环境中，每个 undo tablespace不能被多个实例共享
E.UNDO segments 属于 SYSBACKUP 或 SYS 用户

questions.QuestionText: Which two actions can you perform using DBCA for an existing database?

Options.label: A

questions.Explanation:

对已有数据库，主要功能包括:

--改变服务器模式（Dedicated ↔ Shared）
--创建/管理监听器（部分受限）
--配置初始化参数、表空间等
E.DBCA可以创建监听器，但通常只在创建新数据库时使用,对已有数据库，添加监听器通常用 NETCA（Network Configuration Assistant） 或手动编辑 listener.ora

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true?

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about Enterprise Manager (EM) Express?

Options.label: A

Options.label: B

questions.QuestionText: While one of your databases was in mount state, the datafiles were renamed because they had been moved to a new file system. The database was then opened. Which two statements are true?

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about data block storage in an Oracle Database?

Options.label: A
Options.text: An index block can contain row data.

Options.label: B
Options.text: A table block must always contain row data.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Row data is stored starting at the end of the block.

Options.label: D

questions.Explanation:
A.因为索引块可以包含 键值 + ROWID，ROWID 指向表行，但不存完整行数据;注意：B-tree 索引不存整行，但某些特定索引（如 index-organized table, IOT）索引块确实存储行数据
B.还有空闲的
E.数据块头长度 不完全固定，取决于块类型和一些特性（如表、索引、LOB）只有标准块头是 最小固定长度，实际可扩展

Options.label: A
Options.text: USR1 can revoke the CREATE VIEW privilege from USR3.

Options.text: When the DBA revokes the CREATE VIEW privilege from USR1, it is revoked from USR2 and USR3.

Options.label: F
Options.text: When USR1 revokes the CREATE VIEW privilege from USR2, it is revoked from USR3.

questions.Explanation:
WITH ADMIN OPTION用户可以将自己拥有的系统权限或角色再授予其他用户;授权者可以用 GRANT ... WITH ADMIN OPTION 给别人授予权限;不自动级联撤销
B.DBA可以撤销整个权限，不只是 ADMIN OPTION
WITH GRANT OPTION：用于对象权限；级联撤销。

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about the job?

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about space-saving features in an Oracle Database?

Options.label: A
Options.text: An index that is altered to be UNUSABLE will retain its segment.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Private Temporary Tables (PTTs) when used, are always dropped at the next COMMIT statement.

Options.label: C
Options.text: A table that is truncated will always have all of its extents removed.

Options.label: D

questions.Explanation:
A.当索引被标记为 UNUSABLE 时，其段（segment）被释放或根本未分配
B.PTTs 有两种生命周期类型：1.ON COMMIT DROP DEFINITION → 表定义在事务提交时消失2.ON COMMIT PRESERVE DEFINITION → 表定义在会话结束时消失
C.TRUNCATE是快速清空数据,如果你想移除 全部 extents，需要使用 DROP ALL STORAGE 子句
D.PTT 的metadata（表定义）存储在 SGA 的内存中，不占用数据文件中的永久空间

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about single row functions?

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about an SPFILE?

A.CREATE PFILE='init.ora' FROM SPFILE;
C.数据库 可以使用文本PFILE启动实例，不一定非要SPFILE

questions.QuestionText: An Oracle database server session has an uncommitted transaction in progress which updated 5000 rows in a table. In which three situations does the transaction complete thereby committing the updates?

Options.label: A
Options.text: when the session logs out successfully

Options.label: B
Options.text: when a DBA issues a successful SHUTDOWN IMMEDIATE statement and the user then issues a COMMIT

Options.label: C
Options.text: when a DBA issues a successful SHUTDOWN TRANSACTIONAL statement and the user then issues a COMMIT

Options.label: D
Options.text: when a CREATE INDEX statement is executed successfully in the same session

Options.label: E
Options.text: when a COMMIT statement is issued by the same user from another session in the same database instance

Options.label: F
Options.text: when a CREATE TABLE AS SELECT statement is executed unsuccessfully in the same session

questions.Explanation:
A.当用户会话正常退出时，如果有未提交的事务，Oracle会自动提交或回滚
B.SHUTDOWN IMMEDIATE 会 强制回滚所有未提交事务，并终止会话。
C.SHUTDOWN TRANSACTIONAL会等待所有活动事务完成后再关闭数据库
D.所有DDL操作在Oracle中都是自动提交（implicit commit）：之前的未提交事务会先提交;当前DDL也会提交
E.事务是会话级别的，其他会话的COMMIT不影响当前事务
F.对失败的DDL会自动回滚DDL本身，但是不会影响之前的DML事务。因此未提交的5000行更新仍然未提交。

questions.QuestionText: The STORES table has a column START_DATE of data type DATE, containing the date the row was inserted. You only want to display details of rows where START_DATE is within the last 25 months. Which WHERE clause can be used?

Options.label: A

Options.label: B

Options.label: C

Options.label: D
Options.text: WHERE MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE,start_date)<=25

questions.Explanation: MONTHS_BETWEEN 函数要把当前的时间写在前面，以前的写在后面，否则计算后会出现负数

questions.QuestionText: In which three situations does the transaction complete thereby committing the updates?

Options.label: A
Options.text: when a DBA issues a successful SHUTDOWN TRANSACTIONAL statement and the user then issues a COMMIT.

Options.label: B
Options.text: When a CREATE TABLE AS SELECT statement is issued in the same session but fails with a syntax error.

Options.label: C
Options.text: When a DBA issues a successful SHUTDOWN IMMEDIATE statement and the user then issues a COMMIT.

Options.label: D
Options.text: When a CREATE INDEX statement is executed successfully in the same session.

Options.label: E
Options.text: When the session logs out successfully.

Options.label: F
Options.text: When a COMMIT statement is issued by the same user from another session in the same database instance.

questions.QuestionText: Which two statements are true about the ORDER BY clause?

Options.label: A
Options.text: numeric values are displayed in descending order if they have decimal positions.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Only columns that are specified in the SELECT list can be used in the ORDER BY clause.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Column aliases can be used in the ORDER BY clause.

Options.label: D
Options.text: NULLS are not included in the sort operation.

Options.label: E

questions.Explanation: 默认情况下，NULL 会被认为最大值;显式控制 NULL 排序位置的关键字:NULLS FIRST:NULL 排在最前面;NULLS LAST: NULL 排在最后面

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about Data Manipulation Language (DML)?

Options.label: A
Options.text: INSERT INTO...SELECT...FROM statements automatically commit.

Options.label: B
Options.text: DELETE statements can remove multiple rows based on multiple conditions.

Options.label: C
Options.text: UPDATE statements can have different subqueries to specify the values for each updated column.

Options.label: D
Options.text: DML statements require a primary key be defined on a table.

Options.label: E

questions.Explanation: DDL建改删表清数据;DML增删改合

questions.QuestionText: Which two are true about creating pluggable databases (PDBs) in Oracle 19c and later releases?

Options.label: A
Options.text: A snapshot copy PDB can be a full copy of a source PDB.

Options.label: B
Options.text: A PDB snapshot depends on an existing storage snapshot of the source PDB.

Options.label: C
Options.text: A snapshot copy PDB does not depend on an existing storage snapshot of the source PDB.

Options.label: D
Options.text: A PDB snapshot can be a full copy of a source PDB.

Options.label: E
Options.text: A PDB snapshot can be a sparse copy of a source PDB.

questions.Explanation:
创建 PDB 有几种方法:
1.Full Clone完整克隆:
--创建一个完全独立的 PDB 副本
--占用完整存储空间
--克隆完成后，源 PDB 与克隆 PDB 完全独立
2.Snapshot Clone / Sparse Clone快照/稀疏副本快照
--副本依赖于源 PDB 的数据
--占用空间少,只存储更改部分Copy-on-Write
--如果源 PDB 删除或不可用，快照副本可能受影响

PDB Snapshot是PDB的一个只读副本，通过快照克隆Snapshot Clone创建;强调“快照本身”;
Snapshot Copy PDB可更新快照;可读写; 强调“快照克隆的副本”

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about indexes and their administration in an Oracle database?

Options.label: A
Options.text: A descending index is a type of function-based index.

Options.label: B
Options.text: A unique and non-unique index can be created on the same table column.

Options.label: C
Options.text: An INVISIBLE index is not maintained when Data Manipulation Language (DML) is performed on its underlying table.

Options.label: D
Options.text: If a query filters on an indexed column then it will always be used during execution of the query.

Options.label: E
Options.text: An index can be created as part of a CREATE TABLE statement.

Options.label: F
Options.text: A DROP INDEX statement always prevents updates to the table during the drop operation.

questions.Explanation:
A.Oracle 支持DESCENDING索引，它可以按降序排序数据。Oracle 将降序索引看作是一种函数式索引，因为它通过隐式函数对列进行排序。
B.同一列可以有多个索引，但唯一索引和非唯一索引不可以同时存在在同一列上
F. DROP INDEX时，会对索引结构加锁，防止表上的DML改变该索引; DROP INDEX ONLINE;允许删除索引时进行更新

questions.QuestionText: Which three tasks are performed by background processes in an Oracle database instance?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Creating dedicated server connections

Options.label: B
Options.text: Reading database blocks into the buffer cache

Options.label: C
Options.text: Registering services with Oracle Net listeners.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Writing dirty database block images from the buffer cache.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Writing redo to log files.

questions.Explanation:
Oracle 数据库的后台进程负责各种 数据库维护任务和系统管理工作，主要包括:
--1.DBWR（Database Writer）将修改过的脏数据块dirty blocks(脏块 = 内存中已修改但磁盘尚未更新的数据块)从缓冲区写回磁盘
--2.LGWR（Log Writer）将重做日志（redo log）缓冲区的内容写入磁盘
--3.SMON（System Monitor）系统恢复，清理临时段和PMON(Process Monitor)清理失败的用户进程;注销服务注册服务到 Oracle Net listener 属于PMON的功能
--4.CKPT检查点:本身不写数据块，它负责通知和标记，DBWR负责实际写数据块

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about roles?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Object privileges may not be granted to roles.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Roles must be password protected.

Options.label: C
Options.text: The SET ROLE statement can disable one or more roles for a session.

Options.label: D
Options.text: All roles granted to a user are set on by default when the user logs in.

Options.label: E
Options.text: The SET ROLE statement can enable one or more roles for a session.

Options.label: F
Options.text: Roles may be granted to roles.

questions.Explanation:
A.角色就是用来管理权限的工具;可以将 表、视图、序列等对象的权限授予角色，再把角色授予用户
CE.SET ROLE NONE --禁用所有角色; SET ROLE role1 EXCEPT role2 --启用role1但禁用role2; SET ROLE role1, role2 --启用role1和role2
D.只有通过 ALTER USER ... DEFAULT ROLE 定义的默认角色会在登录时自动启用
F.角色嵌套（Role Hierarchy）可以将一个角色授予另一个角色，这样用户获得角色A，也能继承角色B的权限

questions.QuestionText: Which three statements are true about performing Data Manipulation Language (DML) operations on a view with no INSTEAD OF triggers defined?

Options.label: A
Options.text: Views cannot be used to add or modify rows in an underlying table if the defining query of the view contains the DISTINCT keyword.

Options.label: B
Options.text: Delete statements can always be done on a table through a view.

Options.label: C
Options.text: Insert statements can always be done on a table through a view.

Options.label: D
Options.text: Views cannot be used to query rows from an underlying table if the table has a PRIMARY KEY and the PRIMARY KEY columns are not referenced in the defining query of the view.

Options.label: E
Options.text: Views cannot be used to add rows to an underlying table if the table has columns with NOT NULL constraints lacking default values which are not referenced in the defining query of the view.

Options.label: F
Options.text: The WITH CHECK clause has no effect when deleting rows from the underlying table through the view.

questions.Explanation:
视图就像一个“虚拟表” — 它本身不存储数据，只保存一个 SELECT 查询。当你对视图做查询时，数据库后台其实执行那个 SELECT，得到结果。
注意点:1.必须有 CREATE VIEW 权限.
2.基础表base tables或被引用的视图必须存在,且你有必要的 SELECT 权限
3.可选的 OR REPLACE、FORCE、NOFORCE等子句，用以替换已有视图或在基础对象不存在时仍创建视图
一般来说，用户执行 SELECT、INSERT、UPDATE、DELETE 操作视图也需要基础对象相应的权限。
删除视图:使用 DROP VIEW 来删除
可更新视图（Inherently updatable view）支持DML（INSERT / UPDATE / DELETE）:每个视图中的列都必须映射到单一表的一列;--视图定义不能包含 DISTINCT、 GROUP BY、 ORDER BY、集合表达式（collection expression in SELECT）等;--如果视图中有伪列（如 ROWID、ROWNUM）或表达式，则不能更新那些列对应的基础表行;--如果基础表有 NOT NULL约束且视图中未包含这些列，那么通过视图INSERT可能失败;--OIN 多表的视图通常也是不可更新，或者只能更新部分基础表
如果在创建视图时加入WITH CHECK OPTION，那么通过视图的 INSERT/UPDATE 操作必须使结果仍然满足视图定义的 WHERE条件

Defining query = 创建视图时的SELECT查询
